items.storedetaileddescription: Walker Tape®’s 99% Alcohol is an essential tool for proper scalp prep and cleanliness. It effectively removes oil, dirt, and residue from both the skin and your workstation surfaces, ensuring a clean foundation for a long-lasting and secure bond.
items.featureddescription:
Flammable - do not store near or use near heat, sparks, or open flame. Use in a well-ventilated area. Close lid tightly. Do not apply to broken, cut, or irritated skin. External use only, do not ingest. Avoid eye contact. Keep out of reach of children. Test on a small area before use.    

   

Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). SDS sheet is available below.
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 
  1. Saturate a Sponge Brush with 99% Alcohol.
  2. Apply a thin layer evenly across your client’s scalp, or the area you wish to sanitize. Wait a few seconds for the alcohol to evaporate.
  3. If you are installing a hair system, apply 99% Alcohol first, followed by a scalp protector, and then your tape or adhesive.
items.pagetitle: 99% Isopropyl Alcohol - 12 oz, Spray | Walker Tape
